Detailed Description

AIML class that represents the AIML XML tag "learn".

Every time a XML Tag of AIML is encountered, an instance of this class will be created. All text inbetween the begin and end tag, all attributes, and all inner Tags will go through methods of this class.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Learn (  )  throw (InternalProgrammerErrorException &)

Default constructor to initalize the private implementation (m_pimpl) data.

Exceptions:
InternalProgrammerErrorException is thrown only if the error is so grave that the entire AIML engine has to be shut down.

virtual ~Learn (  )  [virtual]

Default virtual destructor.

Destroys the private implementation (m_pimpl) data.

Member Function Documentation

StringPimpl getString (  )  const throw (InternalProgrammerErrorException &) [virtual]

Calls InnerTemplateListImpl::getString() and then calls GraphBuilderFramework.addFile() with the string.

It DOES NOT call GraphBuilderFramework::createGraph(). That would invalidate internal iterators and cause the Rebecca engine to crash.

Instead it relys on GraphBuilder::getResponse() to call GraphBuilder::createGraph() for it.

Returns:
The string after calling InnerTemplateListImpl::getString(), in this case an empy string.

Reimplemented from InnerTemplateListImpl.

Member Data Documentation

LearnImpl* m_pimpl [private]

The private implementation in which you cannot get access to.

This pointer holds the private methods and private member variables of this class. This makes ABI (Application Binary Interface) more resilient to change. See the private implementation idiom on the internet for more information about this.

Reimplemented from InnerTemplateListImpl.
